meanings.definition: A freestanding, open-sided structure typically found in gardens or parks.
meanings.sent1: The gazebos in the park provide shade for picnics.
meanings.sent2: We had a lovely tea party under the gazebos in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels were having a meeting in the gazebos, discussing their nut collection.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a garden, with gazebos of memories scattered throughout.
meanings.sent5: The gazebos stood like elegant sentinels, guarding the beauty of the park.
